name: Chain Golem
description: The Chain Golem is a Large Construct composed of heavy chains, featuring a mechanical design that emphasizes its durability and strength. It grapples and restrains foes, showcasing formidable physical attacks.
memorable: Its ability to inflict Infernal Tetanus and its resistance to magical effects make it a daunting opponent in combat.
goals: Typically employed by those who seek to harness its mechanical might for combat or protection.
relations: Often created by wizards or artificers, it may serve under powerful entities or be found guarding treasures.
environment: Can be found in dungeons or locations where constructs are utilized for protection.
strengths: Immune to a variety of conditions, strong physical attacks, and Magic Resistance provide exceptional resilience in battle.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma scores limit its tactical sophistication and social interactions.
attacks: Multiattack with two Chain attacks that deal slashing damage and can infect targets with Infernal Tetanus, grappling them.
most_powerful_ability: Infernal Tetanus, which inflicts debilitating symptoms and can potentially paralyze targets.
senses: It possesses darkvision and is immune to various conditions, enhancing its combat effectiveness.
skills: Has a passive perception of 10, signifying average awareness.
additional_information: Construct Nature allows it to function without biological needs.
Immutable Form makes it immune to spells or effects that alter its form.
Magic Weapons ensure its attacks can bypass resistance to non-magical damage.
Imprison ability can restrain and deal damage to captured foes.
Resistance to many conditions makes it exceptionally resilient.
test_queries: golem with chain attacks and disease
brutal melee attacker with Infernal Tetanus
Large construct that grapples and imprisons
